actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-852.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on H.R. 4986, to amend the Federal Reserve Act to authorize the automatic transfer of funds, to authorize negotiable order-of-withdrawal accounts at depository institutions, to authorize federally chartered savings and loan associations to establish remote service units, and to authorize federally insured credit unions to maintain share draft accounts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4986 (depository institution transfer of funds).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on H.R. 4986, to amend the Federal Reserve Act to authorize the automatic transfer of funds, to authorize negotiable order-of-withdrawal accounts at depository institutions, to authorize federally chartered savings and loan associations to establish remote service units, and to authorize federally insured credit unions to maintain share draft accounts, and for other purposes.
